name: 3dTstat
author: AFNI Developers
description: Compute voxel-wise statistics using AFNI 3dTstat command

inputs.name: In file
inputs.description: Input file to 3dtstat.

inputs.name: Mask
inputs.description: Mask file.

inputs.name: Num threads
inputs.description: Set number of threads.

inputs.name: Options
inputs.description: Selected statistical output.

inputs.name: Outputtype
inputs.description: 'nifti' or 'afni' or 'nifti_gz'. Afni output filetype.

inputs.name: Sum
inputs.description: Compute sum of input voxels.

inputs.name: Absolute Sum
inputs.description: Compute absolute sum of input voxels.

inputs.name: Sum of Squares
inputs.description: Compute sum of squares.

inputs.name: L2 Norm
inputs.description: Compute L2 norm (sqrt(sum squares)).

inputs.name: Mean
inputs.description: Compute mean of input voxels.

inputs.name: Slope
inputs.description: Compute the slope of input voxels vs. time.

inputs.name: Standard Deviation
inputs.description: Compute standard deviation of input voxels.

inputs.name: Standard Deviation No Detrending
inputs.description: Compute standard deviation of input voxels without detrending.

inputs.name: Coefficient of Variation
inputs.description: Compute coefficient of variation of input voxels.

inputs.name: Coefficient of Variation No Detrending
inputs.description: Compute coefficient of variation of input voxels without detrending.

inputs.name: Inverse Coefficient of Variation
inputs.description: Compute inverse coefficient of variation of input voxels.

inputs.name: Inverse Coefficient of Variation No Detrending
inputs.description: Compute inverse coefficient of variation of input voxels without detrending.

inputs.name: Temporal Signal to Noise Ratio
inputs.description: Compute temporal signal to noise ratio.

inputs.name: Median Absolute Deviation
inputs.description: Compute median absolute deviation of input voxels.

inputs.name: Durbin-Watson Statistic
inputs.description: Compute Durbin-Watson Statistic of input voxels.

inputs.name: Median
inputs.description: Compute median of input voxels.

inputs.name: Non-Zero Median
inputs.description: Compute median of non-zero input voxels.

inputs.name: Non-Zero Standard Deviation
inputs.description: Compute standard deviation of non-zero input voxels.

inputs.name: Biweight Midvariance
inputs.description: Compute biweight midvariance of input voxels.

inputs.name: Mean of Successive Squared Differences
inputs.description: Compute mean of successive squared differences of input voxels.

inputs.name: Square Root of MSSD
inputs.description: Compute square root of mean of successive squared differences of input voxels.

inputs.name: Median of Absolute Values of First Time Differences
inputs.description: Compute median of absolute values of first time differences of input voxels.

inputs.name: Minimum
inputs.description: Compute minimum of input voxels.

inputs.name: Maximum
inputs.description: Compute maximum of input voxels.

inputs.name: Absolute Maximum
inputs.description: Compute absolute maximum of input voxels.

inputs.name: Signed Absolute Maximum
inputs.description: Compute signed absolute maximum of input voxels.

inputs.name: Percentile
inputs.description: Compute the P-th percentile point of the data in each voxel time series.

inputs.name: Index of Minimum
inputs.description: Compute index of minimum of input voxels.

inputs.name: Index + 1 of Minimum
inputs.description: Compute index + 1 of minimum of input voxels.

inputs.name: Index of Maximum
inputs.description: Compute index of maximum of input voxels.

inputs.name: Index + 1 of Maximum
inputs.description: Compute index + 1 of maximum of input voxels.

inputs.name: Index of Absolute Maximum
inputs.description: Compute index of absolute maximum of input voxels.

inputs.name: Index + 1 of Absolute Maximum
inputs.description: Compute index + 1 of absolute maximum of input voxels.

inputs.name: Duration
inputs.description: Compute number of points around max above a threshold.

inputs.name: Onset
inputs.description: Compute beginning of duration around max where value exceeds basepercent.

inputs.name: Offset
inputs.description: Compute end of duration around max where value exceeds basepercent.

inputs.name: Centroid
inputs.description: Compute centroid of data time curves.

inputs.name: Centroid Duration
inputs.description: Compute duration using centroid's index as center.

inputs.name: Non-Zero Mean
inputs.description: Compute mean of non-zero voxels.

inputs.name: Zero Count
inputs.description: Count number of zero values at each voxel.

inputs.name: Non-Zero Count
inputs.description: Count number of non-zero values at each voxel.

inputs.name: Autocorrelation
inputs.description: Compute autocorrelation function and return first n coefficients.

inputs.name: Autoregression
inputs.description: Compute autoregression coefficients and return first n coefficients.

inputs.name: Accumulate
inputs.description: Accumulate time series values (partial sums).

inputs.name: Centromean
inputs.description: Compute mean of middle 50% of voxel values.

inputs.name: Skewness
inputs.description: Measure of asymmetry in distribution.

inputs.name: Kurtosis
inputs.description: Measure of the 'tailedness' of the probability distribution.

inputs.name: First Value
inputs.description: First value in dataset.

inputs.name: First Difference
inputs.description: Take the first difference of each time series before further processing.

inputs.name: Prefix
inputs.description: Use string 'p' for the prefix of the output dataset [DEFAULT = 'stat'].

inputs.name: Datum
inputs.description: Use data type 'd' for the type of storage of the output, where 'd' is one of 'byte', 'short', or 'float' [DEFAULT=float].

inputs.name: No Scale
inputs.description: Do not scale output values when datum is byte or short. Scaling is done by default.

inputs.name: Base Percent
inputs.description: Percentage of maximum for duration calculation.

inputs.name: Mask Mset
inputs.description: Use the dataset 'mset' as a mask. Only voxels with nonzero values in 'mset' will be printed from 'dataset'.

inputs.name: Mask Range
inputs.description: Further restrict the voxels from 'mset' so that only those mask values between 'a' and 'b' (inclusive) will be used.

inputs.name: Cmask
inputs.description: Execute the options enclosed in single quotes as a 3dcalc-like program, and produce a mask from the resulting 3D brick.
